entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
